positions.title: 1st Assistant
positions.description:
1st assistant to stylist Keegan Singh (Streeters NY & LA)

www.keegansingh.com
www.streeters.com/artists/stylists/keegan-singh/

Credits include:

Editorial: Anja Rubik's 25 Magazine, W Magazine (US), Vogue Mexico & Latin America, LOVE Magazine, V Magazine, 25 Magazine, Interview US, Out Of Order, nowness.com, models.com, Sunday Times Style, Muse, Allure

Advertising: Anja Rubik for Giuseppe Zanotti, Eddie Borgo, Equipment, Gucci, Helmut Lang, Target, Theory, Helmut Lang, Cushnie et Ochs, Metrocity

Runway: Cushnie et Ochs, Delpozo

Photographers: Santiago & Mauricio, Paola Kudacki, Sebastian Kim, Alasdair McLellan, Barnaby Roper, Hugh Lippe, Sean Thomas, Matthew Donaldson, Peter Arnell, Mark Abrahams, Jason Frank Rothenberg, Fabio Crovi, Cedric Bihr, Tom Allen, Jennifer Livingston, Alessio Boni, Olivia Bee, Petra Collins, John Beecroft

Celebrities: Julianne Moore, Anja Rubik, Allison Mosshart, Matthew Mosshart, Adam Driver, The Black Belles, Adriana Lima, Miranda Kerr, Alessandra Ambrosio, Dree Hemingway, Amanda Seyfried

positions.title: Freelance Styling Assistant
positions.description:
Freelance assistant to:

Patti Wilson, Katie Mossman, Elizabeth Sulcer, Cathy Kasterine, Deborah Waknin, Camilla Pole, Naomi Miller, William Graper, Jean-Michel Clerc, Emma Wyman, Melis Kuris, among others.

Credits include:

Editorial: 25 Magazine, Vogue Turkey, Vogue Australia, L'Uomo Vogue, Numero Paris, Numero Tokyo, Numero China, Numero Homme China, Harper’s Bazaar US, Elle Mexico, InStyle, Mixte, Net A Porter The Edit, The Block, Wallpaper, models.com, nowness.com, New York Magazine, Sunday Times Travel, Styleby, Kinfolk, Elle Vietnam, Twin, Muse

Advertising: MAC, Express, Ann Taylor, Garnier Fructis, L’Oreal Women of Worth, Jaguar, Sally Hanson, Clinique, E! Entertainment, Avon, Claire's, Ippolita, Keurig, Urban Decay, Cotton On, Njoy, Magaschoni, Cuddl Duds

Photographers: Ward Ivan Rafik, Steven Sebring, Daniel Sannwald, Greg Kadel, Jean Roy, Nino Munoz, Ben Hassett, Simon Cave, Santiago & Mauricio, Michael Avedon, Emma Tempest, Jem Mitchell, Neil Bedford, Liam Warwick, Bruno Staub, Matteo Montanari, Benn Watts, Andrew Eccles, Philippe Solamon, Takahiro Ogawa, Kevin Sinclair, Simon Burstall, Tesh, Kerry Hallihan, Bon Duke, Nadya Wasylko, Michael Schwartz

Celebrity: Courtney Love, Julianne Moore, David Beckham, Kate Hudson, Kate Walsh, Jade Jagger, Susie Wolf, Anja Rubik, Emily Mortimer, Kim, Kourtney & Khloe Kardashian, Idina Menzel, Naomi Watts, Anais Pouliot, Katrina Bowden, Annabelle Selldorf, Ansel Elgort, Giuliana Rancic, Hannah Ware

positions.title: Freelance Graphic Designer & Art Director
positions.description: Freelance design work for clients such as Marks & Spencer, style.sky.com, promod.co.uk, Boden, Conde Nast, net-a-porter.com, not-just-a-label.com, Revlon and Clinique

allData.headline: Fashion Stylist
allData.summary: New York and London based stylist creating images for editorials, advertising & commercials, lookbooks, celebrities & personalities.
